title: Awakening
description: Fighting is my life. How else would I hold the reigning title of heavyweight champion?I don’t have time for anything else in my life.Not drama.Not injuries.Not relationships…All I ever need is one night to take off the edge.One night of meaningless...And that night, the lucky girl was Violet Lancaster.Now I’m being forced to decide.Do I want to defend my title again?Or should I walk away from everything I know?
author: Jax McKay
